org.sensorhub.impl.comm

Class RobustIPConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.module.RobustConnection
      • org.sensorhub.impl.comm.RobustIPConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RobustHTTPConnection

    public abstract class RobustIPConnection
extends RobustConnection

    Helper class for handling automatic reconnections to hosts on IP networks

    Since:
    Jun 25, 2016
    Author:
    Alex Robin

    • Method Detail

      • tryConnect

        public boolean tryConnect(String host)
                   throws IOException
        Try to ping host with ICMP packets (must be root)
        Parameters:
        host - host name or address to connect to
        Returns:
        True if connection was successful; False if unsuccessful but can be retried
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection was unsuccessful and shouldn't be retried

      • tryConnectTCP

        public boolean tryConnectTCP(String host,
                    int port)
                      throws IOException
        Try to connect to host on given TCP port
        Parameters:
        host - host name or address to connect to
        port - TCP port to connect to
        Returns:
        True if connection was successful; False if unsuccessful but can be retried
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection was unsuccessful and shouldn't be retried
